title: Providing  Training on Modern Dairy Farming practices for Veterinary Surgeons engaged in the Livestock Sector
decision_details: - During the past years, the local dairy farming has achieved a significant progress and along with it, the demand for trained expertise knowledge in this sector has also increased. As such, it has been proposed to provide special training on modern dairy farming practices and technical and research  methods required for the veterinary surgeons engaged in the livestock sector in the country. Accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. P. Harison, the Minister of Rural Economy, to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding between the Belarusian State Agrarian Technical University and the Government of Sri Lanka, to provide training for 10 veterinary surgeons engaged in the dairy extension services in the said University, was approved by the Cabinet.
